name: Something Strange (In Your Neighborhood)
description: Made for the JTA Jam #2 using their flashlight tutorial with the theme "death is useful" and the Gamedev.js Jam 2022 with the theme "raw". In Something Strange, you use your dual-purpose flashlight/vacuum to suck up electricity ghosts. In addition to getting rid of the pests, their "death is useful" since they turn into "raw" power which keeps your flashlight active.
